name: Planar Escape (Alexander Wilson)
description:
My first complete game. I made it in 50 hours using Unity. I currently use Godot now to make games, so this MAY be my last Unity game.

It includes:

  • Several singleplayer levels where you're running from an entity trying to kill you.
  • 2 local multiplayer levels (1 randomly generated) where you get to run with other people.
  • A whole lot of fun for the family.

* I uploaded this game before, but I took it down because I didn't think it was all that great, and wasn't sure if I would get in trouble using someone else's music (which was a free demo on the audio creation software that I use). I even deleted the project that I used, so I can't make any more changes to the game. However, looking back on the game, I now actually think it's pretty good, so I have decided to reupload it. Thank you to anyone who is reading this, or to the one's that download shady looking games like these and play them. I do hope you enjoy!
